Package hr.dice.assignments.currency_exchange.controllers

Class BalanceController

java.lang.Object
hr.dice.assignments.currency_exchange.controllers.BalanceController
All Implemented Interfaces:
BalanceController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/balance") public class BalanceController extends Object implements BalanceController
Controller class for handling balance-related requests.

    • transferMoneyFromBalance

      @PutMapping("/transfer/{balanceFromId}/{balanceToId}/{amount}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BalanceDto> transferMoneyFromBalance(@PathVariable Long balanceFromId, @PathVariable Long balanceToId, @PathVariable Double amount)
      Handles the transfer of money between two balances.
      Specified by:
      transferMoneyFromBalance in interface BalanceController
      Parameters:
      balanceFromId - The ID of the balance to transfer money from.
      balanceToId - The ID of the balance to transfer money to.
      amount - The amount of money to transfer.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated BalanceDto of the recipient balance if successful, HttpStatus.OK otherwise.
